description:
Summer`s night sky and fireworks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Natsu no Yozora to Otome no Himei / Natsu no Yozora to Otome no Sakebi / Natsu no Yozora ni Negai yo Todoke
The Summer`s Night Sky and the Maiden`s Cry / The Summer`s Night Sky and the Maiden`s Scream / Wishing Upon the Summer`s Night Sky
夏の夜空と乙女の悲鳴 / 夏の夜空と乙女の叫び / 夏の夜空に願いよ届け
